TopicTitle: I have something more to do with this!

Articles.Content:
so a while ago i posted the pics of a project i did when i was bored.

so i also realized that i'm gonna have to improve my animating skills to make my show better.

And then i realized that I have some really good rigs on these guys (because heck, i work on these far later at night than the kerbal show)

NOTE; it's a GL render, so it doesn't have any of the lighting or the glow effects.

Be sure to let me know what you think.
I didn't mention this above. but be sure to comment to let me know what you think...
I wish i could do stuff like this, i'd have my own game by now if i could.

I wish i could do stuff like this, i'd have my own game by now if i could.

Well, animating takes two things, Time. and boredom to learn it. it's a slow skill, and not one of those things you can just pick up and master (unless you're an animating god, then feel free to master it instantly)

I would recommend if you want to learn using blender and getting some models that come rigged. then record yourself doing the actions with a webcam or something, then try and match the movements of the rig, with the movements you make (that is if it's a human rig)
Oh also. this week's episode is going to be delayed. instead i'm gonna do a render test.
